default.question: Is this really free?
default.answer: Yes. All services are free for IEHP members.

default.question: Do I have to be ready to quit?
default.answer: No. We meet you where you are.

default.question: What products do you offer?
default.answer: Free nicotine patches may be available if medically appropriate.

default.question: Is my information private?
default.answer: Yes. Your information is kept confidential.

default.question: Can I quit vaping too?
default.answer: Yes. Kick It California helps with both smoking and vaping.

name: cta_text
label: CTA Button Text
default: Sign Up for Free Quit Support
